extendedInfo.description: " It was hard to find any issues with PaperBoy's UI, usability or content delivery. The app provides a simple way to browse the top headlines from your favorite news sources, and -- probably best of all -- doesn't get caught up trying to offer too much. The app is free in the Play Store, so it's hard not to recommend that you go give it a try. "- Review by AndroidCentral.com  [ http://www.androidcentral.com/paperboy-quick-and-casual-news-reading ]Data snacking is a common behavior among users when consuming news on a mobile device. Paperboy leverages on this behavior by providing the user with a simple interface to quickly read a quick summary of the news articles from the sources selected. It also supports - Offline access to all news articles - One click share with Google plus, Facebook & Twitter- Follow articles recommended by other users- Already read articles will have b&w images- scheduler to refresh articles with quiet hours - Guest login to try out the app- quick list to jump between articles. - rich notificationsKW: Paperboy, Search , news, newspaper

reviews.title: No News!
reviews.comment: Nice design, but how is it a NEWS reader, with NO NEWS SOURCES???
reviews.author: Dave Raymond

reviews.title: Looks great, not there yet
reviews.comment: This looks like an awesome app for my news junky-ness. Fairly easy (though sometimes not very logic in usage.. Leading to some confusion when manoeuvring in the app), looks great, scrolling is stunning. But... Right now, it does not have enough subscriptions. Even for Sports it says \'no subscriptions available\'. Customization options are also limited (font size and stuff). Will be keeping an eye on this app!
reviews.author: Jasper Roos

reviews.title: Getting there...
reviews.comment: The test version runs quite well. I uninstalled the test and installed the app and it is now no longer working. This app has great potential. I\'m looking forward to the finished product. Developer is very attentive and answers emails quick. Looking forward to stable version.:-)
reviews.author: Denise Corbin

reviews.title: Not working on Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: Not getting any feed and the sources also are not loading? Any fixes?
reviews.author: Kripa Jaising

reviews.title: Not working on my S4
reviews.comment: When I load it, no feeds load. If I click the arrow on the left, no sources appear.
reviews.author: Todd Foster

reviews.title: Good communication and updates
reviews.comment: Developer is very good at responding to comments and suggestions. This app is getting better with frequent updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load my feeds
reviews.comment: Nice feel,  but gets my Google account. Does not then load up my feeds from Reader.  Also if I have read all the articles take me to the next feed, not round in a circle.
reviews.author: Ian Craigen

reviews.title: Scroll speed controls/ app permissions
reviews.comment: There should be a setting to control the speed the article is displayed on the lockscreen in JB. And why does it require permission to see what apps I have on my device or which apps are running? That\'s why I have refused to update the version I\'m using.
reviews.author: Nitin George

reviews.title: Sucks Battery
reviews.comment: Good start... But sucks the battery in my GS2. Uninstalling now
reviews.author: Sivaprakasam Rajappan

reviews.title: Force close...?
reviews.comment: Force close when trying to log in with Google account.. Need fix asap!!
reviews.author: Andreas Lerv\303\245g

reviews.title: i like it
reviews.comment: like it allot reminds me of newsroom which was my favorite just needs more options making fornt smaller/bigger mark all articles read anf stuff like that swipe up to see unread would also be great
reviews.author: Dzenan Kotoric

reviews.title: Google reader integration
reviews.comment: I love the app... But please, include a feature to load the users Google reader feeds
reviews.author: Christian Scicluna

reviews.title: Crap. Just total crap.
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work at all. Gonna wait for one update.
reviews.author: Shazad Anwar

reviews.title: Nice app but needs polishing
reviews.comment: Get rid of the white effect on the sidebar,  higher quality logo,  higher quality icons in the sidebar or no icons at all, an actual unwavy box behind the number of unread articles count,  and more room inbetween the source pictures. Also maybe add a text list view of the sources and add custom rss feed abilities and syncing with Google reader
reviews.author: Eric Karnes

reviews.title: Newsfeed = 3 poor sources from India.
reviews.comment: I\'m in the UK.  The app knows my location,  why no proper news feeds.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Eric James

reviews.title: Nice concept and UI
reviews.comment: Love the UI and concept. And the app is coming in handy during my daily commute to work.
reviews.author: tarun mittal

reviews.title: very nice app
reviews.comment: excellent app loved the side menu aand offline caching
reviews.author: Rahul Viradiya
